release.notes: D1 Fixed sleepmsg when player has unrestricted permission. D2 Fixed legacy color code in unrestricted sleepmsg. D3 Updated adventure and MiniMessage for 1.21.5

developer.notes: D1 Changed to a better Json message sender. Removed Adventure as it's not needed anymore. D2 Fixed cancel messages, added log for delayTime. D3 Fixed mislabeled paths. D4 fixed raw JSON rendering on Paper with MiniMessage/Gson fallback; added sleep/dayskip_canceled YAML categories. D5 Added config options `ignoreVanishedPlayers` and `autoFixSleepingPercentage`. Moved sleep/day skip mechanics into a dedicated `PlayerBedEnterHandler` class for better modularity and maintainability D6 Fixed an issue where SPS would think a player is sleeping already, fixed some message formats. D7 Implemented robust JSON message handler that properly detects and supports raw vanilla JSON, MiniMessage, and legacy colors without conflicts.
